tool_description: An API getting you all the important details about the 10 top products from amazon or ebay, by product name.
name: Amazon and eBay products details
title: Amazon and eBay products details

api_list.name: Get Top 10 Products From Amazon
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you Amazon's top 10 products with all the details about each and one of them.

api_list.name: Get Top 10 Products From eBay
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you eBay's top 10 products with all the details about each and one of them.
